lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: In addition to my regular work I am an entrepreneur. I know what it is like to start and run a small business. I want to help people around the world help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I write words to help people sell things and services.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: It is time to say THANK in a significant way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired civil servant from Quebec (Canada)

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.occupational_info: I get up very early in the morning to be at work before everyone else.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I know there are many good people who just need a helping hand once in awhile.  It's my pleasure to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: I collect data about cancer according to National Rules set down by the American College of Surgeons, the National Institutes of Health and other cancer-governing bodies.  This allows cancer data to be studied.  This helps medical doctors to know what treatments work and how well cancer patients are surviving.

lenders.name: Bryan W.
lenders.loan_because: I also know how difficult it is to start a small business. And how assistance can be the difference between success and failure.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a carpenter.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I can. After starting my own business in 2006 I know I would not have made it without the support of friends and family. I know, first hand, what a difference a loan of any amount can make and I am grateful that I am in a position to help others stabilize their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: In addition to running my own photography business, I teach photography at a small vocational arts college in Denver.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company buy things to sell for the home.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I beleve in the basic principal that KIVA is about.
lenders.occupational_info: I was the Purchsing Manager for a large Snack Foods manufacturer

lenders.name: Helena W
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute & make a change.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: Heard about it on NPR and liked the idea.  Then my girlfriend gave me a gift certificate.
lenders.occupational_info: Some children are born with brains that are too small or that aren't formed correctly.  I try to figure out why.  Someday maybe we will be able to help these children.

lenders.name: Enedina
lenders.loan_because: I love those who are willing to take risks.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to help this world grow and even thought we're giving in small portions, it's given by us with all of our hearts.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: in a global village we are all neighbors.

lenders.name: Silvija
lenders.loan_because: This Gift certificate was given to me by my nephew...and I thank him for opening my eyes ...

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I owe so much to so many. It is a joy to be in the postion to pass it on.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: governments and financial institutions have failed to fullfill their ethical obligations to the greater world society. Now we can acheive positive results on our own.
lenders.occupational_info: Professional Engineer working to find efficient means to develop and extract Oil and Gas Resources.

lenders.name: Marilyn B
lenders.loan_because: Not everyone is fortunate enough to live in the United States, and sometimes need a helping hand
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be married to my high school sweetheart, the love of my live.

lenders.occupational_info: Veterinary orthopedic surgeon

lenders.name: Pedro

lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving to the communiity and especially helping thoes in need.

lenders.name: BEN
lenders.loan_because: My uncle got me started on this and it just makes you feel so good helping others better themselves and their families

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: Because I like to help women help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I help children who areoutside their country of origin without parents or guardian reunite with thei family

lenders.name: GIAAFFFund
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we know how fortunate we have been.  We have so much fun doing this!
lenders.occupational_info: We teach, take care of the old and the young, we are soldiers and students, artists, musicians, traders, nurses, engineers, veterinarians, socialworkers, moms and dads and children

lenders.name: The Lapeyres
lenders.loan_because:
Our house burned to the ground in the SD wildfires in 2003; and we lost all our material possessions and many precious pictures and home videos.  We were showered with help and support from family, friends, strangers and nonprofits everywhere. Participating in Kiva is one small way to "pay it forward" across the world.   

The efficient, direct, personal one-to-one connection to the entrepreneur is the magic of Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I work daily on staying connected  with our two sons and keeping our family as close as possible. We work to instill in them the values that have guided us in life.

lenders.name: J-9
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach seven year-old children in a public French school.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: When someone believes in you, you can accomplish anything.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to help others who have less money.  I loan because I would hope someone would do the same for me if I were in need.  I loan because helping is something I love to do.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to be involved.
lenders.occupational_info: business teacher

lenders.name: Jantzen
lenders.loan_because: i love to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I am 17 years old and a Senior in high school.

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: I know the little I can give will go a long way to help those who have so much less. I believe it can make a difference & that is always a good thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I did work with people, helping them move forward in life after a family member had died. I think I received more than what I gave.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do to help someone in need.  When I lend I feel like I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school five days a week.  I am in seven classes during the day, and do singing and acting after school.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.occupational_info: I provide bookkeeping and small business consulting.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because:
I can and I know how hard it is to fundraise. This is a brilliant concept and I'm glad to be a part of it.

(PS, I'm the one on the left in the green dress!)
lenders.occupational_info:
I work at Living History Farms, an outdoor museum in Iowa that tells the story of agriculture and how Iowan's transformed the midwest! 

There are three working farms the represent 1700, 1850, and 1900 and an 1875 frontier town.

Bo & Luke, the Oxen in the picture, work the land at our 1850 farm.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help people build  their business, help their family and communities. 

I believe everyone deserves a shot at having their dreams become reality and if we can help we all should.

lenders.name: Louis
lenders.loan_because: I believe in what Kiva stands for all of us helping eachother.
lenders.occupational_info: We here have various projects but our main big project is a waste management  project using a technology that takes waste all types of waste without the need of preseparation and transforms such waste to use able materials such as materials for civil construction like bricks and concrete.   Our intention is to use our revenues to support economic and social development in various cities in the country of Brasil.

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: people need it.

lenders.name: Alazar
lenders.occupational_info: Not many people want to be doing business with a collection agency...it's a pretty thankless job...if you require lots of pats on the back this line of work is probably not for you.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Orlando
lenders.loan_because: I always imagine a better world, where everyone knows giving and receiving!

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to make their and everyones lives better.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.occupation: Janitor, project director, taxi driver, cynic.

lenders.name: Sarah
Debra
lenders.loan_because: I want to honor the memory of my son, Alex, who passed away last year.  Alex's dream was to own his own business and to change the world.  Through Kiva, I can see his dreams realized.
lenders.occupational_info: I train teachers who work with mothers and their small children.

lenders.name: Mara
lenders.loan_because: I am very grateful for help I have received in my life and I honour the opportunity to reciprocate.

lenders.name: Santa Barbara Bookies
lenders.loan_because: We love to help women start and maintain businesses so that they can be as independent and prosperous as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of 10 women who have been reading together since 1992.  We meet monthly over dinner and a shared love of reading.  We are: Realtor, Hair products sales, retired attorney, retired teacher, 5th grade teacher, botanic specialist, practicing attorney, office manager, CPA, Arts and Lectures staffer at UCSB.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: The small gesture that I can extend will make a enormous difference in the life of someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Using a computer, I make maps.

lenders.name: Andy, Yvonne & Ariel
lenders.loan_because: to empower grassroot businesses that might be more sustainable and tied to local needs and conditions
lenders.occupational_info: I (Andy) work to support wildlife refuges, supplying water resource expertise.

lenders.name: Eitan
lenders.loan_because: I would like to assist people in kick starting a business, so they can maintain themselves instead of depending on charity.

lenders.name: nicole
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to help those who are less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a secondary school teacher in Canada.

lenders.name: Celestia
lenders.loan_because: It's a fantastic idea. We all tell our kids how great we have it here in the US, and how others in developing countries have so many challenges. But this is a way for us--ALL of us--to help. There aren't many people who can give up their daily lives and join the peace corp, but every single person in America can easily loan $25. I'm certainly not in a high-income bracket, and I was able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw cartoons and other illustrations for commercial use and for gifts and souvenirs.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It is a fantastic way to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.occupational_info: I examine damage done to the environment by companies and design restoration projects to restore the environment after any contamination is cleaned up.

lenders.name: Dude
lenders.loan_because: I can, therefore, I should.

lenders.name: Mazi
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to leverage my resources to help people get ahead.
lenders.occupational_info: Bringing people a smile by connecting them with loved ones.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by this organization's mandate to empower hard-working individuals with loans, rather than simply handing out cash.  I like Kiva's use of the internet to foster a somewhat personal relationship with the entrepreneurs.  I feel like an investment partner and have a real desire to see these businesses succeed.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: it could help people in need

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who need money all around the world.

lenders.name: Remi
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: The greatest gift is giving!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a commercial construction company and own and manage office properties.

lenders.loan_because: we want to and we need to...

lenders.name: Lily & Ciaran Barry

My husband and I feel it's a great honor to be able to assist someone that is doing something really special in their life. Being able to give to someone that is creating a future for them and their children is priceless. We are blessed to be able to give. Thank you Kiva!. 
Jah Bless
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with there paper work when they are buying land or a building.  My husband works in Construction.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: My aunt gave me this as a Christmas present and I am interested to see what it is all about! What a great gift, because I get to share it with someone else!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people to get them stronger after they have a injury or surgery.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of one to make a difference to the whole.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a local non-profit group, Bridgeway House. An organization that provides services for children who have autism.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva has the right formula and the money is not wasted with overly expensive administration.
lenders.occupational_info: Private Investigator enforcing Intellectual Property rights of companies and persons whose patents, trademarks or copyrights are being illegally used by other persons or companies that do not own them.  Typically counterfeit watches and other products.

lenders.name: Kirbi
lenders.loan_because: the Bible says that's what Jesus would do.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I'm thankful for my life circumstance and if I can help someone else that enhances my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I photograph weddings in California, USA.

lenders.name: Erin Dibos
lenders.loan_because: i have a little bit more than i need.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is an excellent way to share a little of what I have.I feel that loans are better than donations from the receiving end as well - sense of accomplishment, pride, success, etc
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the healthcare field. My job is to help restore function to those patients who have had a physical injury, disease process, or trauma. I work with patients with back, neck, or joint pain; those who have had strokes or spinal cord injuries; those with arthritis, joint replacements, and such.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: in a small way I can help change the world.

lenders.name: Eleanor
lenders.loan_because: it's a very easy way to help someone in a constructive way

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: I want to help in some small way

lenders.name: Abbey
lenders.loan_because: it reminds me how lucky I am. Also, kiva loans aren't just another band-aid solution; they are a real way for the hardworking people of these disadvantaged areas to improve the life of their family.  It gives them incentive to teach their children to always keep reaching for a better life, because for some, these loans offer the first real indication of something out there to reach for.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Because I Can
lenders.occupational_info: I work in watercolours, warm glass, fine sliver and an eclectic collection of anything else. I love bold colours and incorporate them in everything I do.

lenders.name: Kendall
lenders.loan_because: We are each responsible to demonstrate the generosity of the people of the United States that is not always represented by our leaders.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I hope my efforts here help make a positive impact no matter how small all over the world. And when one person repays I'm going to keep that money going to the next person it can help.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way to make an impact

lenders.name: Ashchin The Sharing Dog
lenders.loan_because: I too am poor. I too needed other peoples money to start my small business.  I have been shown great kindness and generosity sometimes from complete strangers. Time to pass the kindness on.
lenders.occupational_info: I live in the bush and make a tasty syrup from the sap of some of the trees.

lenders.name: Chad & Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: we have the resources to share and we want to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Jen teaches kindergarten students and Chad works with adults on environmental issues.

lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people having mental or emotional problems.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others build a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: darryl
lenders.loan_because: I would like to start a Financial Consultant Biz. I am a homeless US Army Veteran at this time. I will start school this January.
lenders.occupational_info: I would refer RE Developments to investors seeking to invest in viable projects. This can be done on the internet.

lenders.name: Drake Family
lenders.loan_because: it isn't our money, its Gods, we just steward it the best we can.
lenders.occupational_info: John works at drawing and designing buildings, I help him sometimes, but mostly I just take care of our 2 boys

lenders.name: Jens
lenders.loan_because:
Everybody needs a chance to make the world better. I make loans because it is both the right and the smart thing to do.

The best part is that my loans are a direct, person-to-person connection with someone in need.

Kiva gives me everything I need to make a real, positive and personal difference for an entrepreneur, their family and their community by enabling me and you to make a loan of as little as $25.00 to the borrower of our choice.

Search for borrowers in need by location, gender, business sector and loan amount, see their pictures and read their stories.

Read detailed information on Kiva's field partners, the organizations on the ground in dozens of countries around world that make the loans happen.

Make your loans, and receive updates on the progress your borrowers make on the road to their dreams - helped along by your generosity and that of your fellow lenders.

Find out how satisfying helping others through Kiva can be - let's finance the next entrepreneur together.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps!
lenders.occupational_info: I help students succeed in a university setting.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I feel Kiva allows me to plug into the world community and offer a hand up for someone with the will to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: College Student

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.occupational_info: I help students get into college.

lenders.name: Myra H.
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way I know to leverage the money I can afford to loan to help other women succeed.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others become financially self-sufficient in a way that builds confidence in themselves and hope in others.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Responsibility encourages growth

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.occupation: Wandering Rambler Who Enjoys The Silence

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have had people who believed in me enough to give me a chance and want to help others get the same. Particularly in Mexico, as that is my favorite place on earth!
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee the garbage pick-up crews and drive a 25 tonne truck.

lenders.name: Janna
lenders.loan_because: Teach our children the value of money and of helping others.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful that I'm able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I design buildings.  I love to travel, see new places, meet new people.  I'm excited for the opportunity to lend a hand to someone working hard for what they want.

lenders.name: Prof.H
lenders.loan_because:
My work while in Cape Coast, Ghana, West Africa (at Mfantsipim School) changed my outlook on life.  My sister gave an initial amount in my name and I found this site as a great way to give back to the country that I call my second home.

I also see Kiva as a way to give to other communities and people.  I have interest in helping people in all of Africa, the Middle East and Asia as their success and prosperity is vital to our own.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach literature, writing and the Bible to community college students.  Community college in the U.S. is a great place for students who cannot either afford the tuition of larger institutions or do not have the academic skills to gain acceptance to such institutions.  Basically my job is helping people understand and achieve.

lenders.loan_because: for love, only love

lenders.occupational_info: I am thrilled to see that there is a way to help out others around the world like this and I am inspired by that in this all too frequently sad world that there is still kindness to be found. I was started by my uncle who gave me a gift certificate for Christmas 2007.

lenders.name: Joe & Jean-Ann & Scat

lenders.occupational_info: Joe Manages a 1890's store in a historic Park and Jean-Ann sews costumes for the Park Staff we are both semi-retired and work only in the summer months.  Scat gives up one bag of treats a month for the cause.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Giving to other people gives me the blessings of both realizing how much I have even though I struggle myself as a single mother AND the wonderful feeling of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to young adults in college.

lenders.name: Barbara & Robert
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world. Give a man a fish: he eats for a day. TEACH a man to fish: he eats for a lifetime
lenders.occupational_info: Owner of a construction company. We renovate Homes

lenders.name: Damon & Alice
lenders.loan_because: To redistribute wealth for the good of the world.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I spent 8 years working for a bank. Now I want to try doing banking one-on-one, to see if it feels even more rewarding to help someone who needs a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an idea person. I like to put ideas into action. I'm no longer with the bank, my previous employer. I want to set up a business of my own, so I'm very interested in what people around the world are doing with their small businesses.

lenders.name: Sonny & Maureen
lenders.loan_because:
it's the right thing to do ,nobody succeeds without help of somekind
and what better way to give people a little help "Its not what we're owed it's what we owe"

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: I like empowering active persons
lenders.occupational_info: Use nasty chemicals to make RO Water

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: For so long I felt that we could no longer make a difference in the world.  Kiva allows me to help people do what they dream of doing and support their families to the best of their abilities.  I only hope that this little thing makes big things happen.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because:
I appreciate all the breaks I've been given, and this is a way I can return the favor and multiply it. 
    Ask and You Shall Receive, believe that you have it and it shall be yours. Thanks for asking!

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I am very much aware of how lucky I am to have been born in a part of the world with lots of opportunities and wealth.  Personally, I don't have a lot of money, but it's not very hard to lend some of what I do have!
lenders.occupational_info: I am working on an advanced college degree (PhD) in English literature.  In particular, I work with poems and plays from England that are about 400 years old.  I teach college students about these stories, poems, and plays and I also teach writing.

lenders.name: Claudette
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I have lived and worked in developing countries for many years.  Kiva is a great example of how individuals around the globe can work together to promote community development and social improvements.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sociology professor at a local university and teach classes on global social change, organizational development, and environmental management.   I have also conducted research on collaborative management of natural resources.

lenders.name: Alicia(1996-2009)
lenders.loan_because: To make people happy and fulfill their goals.

lenders.name: Marielle
lenders.loan_because: It is empowers people to turn their dreams into reality

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe that 1 person can make a difference. I want to see change in this world, and proud that I can be apart of the change.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student that enjoys volunteering and being a mentor to hundreds of inner-city children. I also enjoy working with people with disabilities.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important for people to grow and prosper, so their communities can grow and prosper, and then we can all grow and prosper. :)
lenders.occupational_info: I design advertising fliers for business. These fliers go in the news paper.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I am priveledged to have an education and good job.  People should give others a chance too.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for the National Park Service and am now retired.

lenders.name: Zinnia and Laury
lenders.loan_because: My granddaughter and I want  to share with others, and help make the world how we think it should be.   We are happy to have the opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info:
I, Laury, am a woodcarver. I create animal characters out of wood and then sell them. 
Zinnia has just turned one, so her work is mostly learning to walk and putting things in her mouth.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I was gifted $25 for Christmas from my son and his wife, who do a lot of volunteering for organizations that help children. They knew this would appeal to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I get to come to the home of people I love and take care of their two children while they go to work as ER doctors in local hospitals. My hours are crazy, but the family is wonderful and I love the children as if they were my own.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: Lives change even with the smallest mustard seed of hope.
lenders.occupational_info: My work can be challenging yet fulfilling, demanding yet giving, terrifying yet comforting. No matter what line of we are in, it can be all these things.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to be living in the best country in the world (Canada) and have so much. I need to help others to reach their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired military, now working in sales.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people are better than banks.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy skincare and haircare products for a cosmetics retailer with over 200 stores in the United States.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: For the price of a few soy lattes, I can help someone start up or expand a business. Plus, the high from lending feels better than the caffeine rush!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We are all one world family.  We must strive to take care of one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with doctoral students at a university in California.

lenders.name: Allan
lenders.occupation: Retired Mathematician/ Retreaded as Stone Sculptor

lenders.name: Ed
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: Owing your own business is a great experience and is a means towards long term prosperity and independence.  Whatever we can do to facilitate that experience is a good thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a business and real estate lawyer, focusing on transactions, working with startup companies and helping community development organizations create and finance affordable housing.

lenders.name: aaron
lenders.loan_because:
1. multi-national banks are the economic incarnation of Stalin. 
2. unlike voting, it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to directly help someone so far away.
lenders.occupational_info: Watercolor landscape painter

lenders.name: JEANNE & MICHAEL
lenders.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate for Xmas, but will continue to loan because I am lucky enough to have a little extra.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school math and Michael teaches the English language to students new to America.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.occupation: social worker, journalist, tutor, and dog walker

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-loans as one of the best ways to help women (and men) create a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: When I worked I ran a Women's Center that helped women go to college. Now I am raising 3 young boys to hopefully grow into wonderful men.

lenders.name: Carol-Ann
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves to be treated equally and with respect

lenders.name: Flint and Ursula
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way of helping those who are trying so hard to help themselves!  Each of us have been blessed with the ability to share something with those about us!

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: One person CAN make a difference.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur, and I want to give back and help others.  I know how much it means to have someone believe in you and offer help!

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.occupational_info: I am in my last year of college, and I also take care of kids and teach piano.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Heidi & Tony
lenders.loan_because: We care

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: these are my sisters and brothers and I want to help them succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to pay back for all the blessings I have received.  My home land is New Zealand.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: Micro-Financing makes a difference!

lenders.name: Scott C. Spangenberg
lenders.loan_because: the voices threatened me if I didn't.

lenders.name: Michael J R*
lenders.loan_because: We are all slaves to the Bilderberger econonic system and agenda.  Paper currency rules the modern world and I may as well do my part to contribute to the spread of the "system".   LONG LIVE the Trilateral Commission!!!

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I am assured that my money goes entirely and directly to people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed commercial painter.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: it changes lives.

lenders.name: Elle Dornan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who have the will and drive to succeed.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to work and have their own business as I have.  Success can be just a small loan away.
lenders.occupational_info: Designing, estimating, and building or remodeling homes.    I am "Adding Atmosphere to Space".

lenders.name: Dawn & Curt
lenders.loan_because: We know how hard it is to own your own business and  being able to help other small business owners in other parts of the world is exciting and joyful and purposeful!
lenders.occupational_info: Curt designs and oversees the building of homes and business and Dawn works for a warehouse logistical software company.

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for those who have helped me. To be able to be involved in something extraordinary like Kiva is important.
lenders.occupational_info: Due to the present economy in the United States I am unemployed. However, essentially what I enjoy doing in my work is anything that my skill sets can provide a service for someone else.

lenders.name: Zackey Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to do what we can, and teach our son the value of giving to others.

lenders.name: Andrew and Teresa
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: We run a theatre company that does shows about things that need to be changed.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to enable folks and help their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I love meeting my B & B guests from every corner of our wonderful world.

lenders.name: Humby
lenders.loan_because: Helping others achieve their dreams is why we are alive.

lenders.name: Dorte
lenders.loan_because: I like to see things grow ...

lenders.name: Downs Family
lenders.loan_because: We are a family of educators and envoirnmental stewards.  We have been lucky in life and love and want to contribute to those who are ready to work to succeed.

lenders.name: Brittani
lenders.loan_because: I would want somebody to loan to me if I really needed it
lenders.occupational_info: I distribute clothing to stores across the country.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a "hand-up" has more of a lasting impact than a "hand-out".

lenders.name: Mike and Shayne
lenders.loan_because: You reap what you sow...

lenders.name: Pierre A.
lenders.loan_because:
I lend money to this organization because it makes  genuine dreams come true in a well supervised environment. It also brings back memories of similar efforts we undertook ln
service in Rwanda and Burundi.

lenders.name: Ellen and Felix
lenders.loan_because: IWe want to enable women to be independent.
lenders.occupational_info: We build and sell new homes.

lenders.name: Ball
lenders.loan_because: Equal access to financial assistance fosters the healthiest economies

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: Give, and it will be given to you.   I believe in helping others, especially those working to help themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers and satellites.

lenders.name: Jay Reb
lenders.loan_because:
I watched about this web site in PBS, and it has really made an impact on me. Helping others to follow their dreams is something I have always wanted to get involved in.
So, I think this will be a great for me to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Just a full time student.

lenders.name: Monet E.
lenders.loan_because: I know that sometimes all a person needs is a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling meats and cheeses at a local market.

lenders.name: Jay and Jenn
lenders.loan_because: we believe that people should help take care and support one another. We are blessed to have what we have and we want to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: Jay works buying and shipping for the Marine industry and Jenn works with special events and also has background as a youth counsellor with children and teens.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.occupational_info: Internet applications

lenders.name: Fabiola
lenders.loan_because: I am peruvian and I know that peruvian people with a little support can make their business grow and make a difference.

lenders.name: Daron
lenders.loan_because: I find the opportunity to help others who work work and are able to help themselves given the opportunity is and incredibly unique charitable opportunity.   I particularly like loaning to those who have children to support as I believe there isn't a better cause than to give families and children the best opportunities in life possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage information technology workers and complex projects for all types of industries.

lenders.name: Heather & Craig
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy to share the good fortune we've had with more people in an empowering way.

lenders.name: Craig and Michelle
lenders.loan_because: All people are made in the image of God and deserve a chance to succeed and be fruitful.

lenders.name: Skjærgaarden
lenders.loan_because: nobody can get somebody started
lenders.occupational_info: farmer

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: I believe if people have something to lose, they will not go to war as easily. So why not help them build something?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a translator, but when business is bad (= most of the time), I trade in stocks.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I want direct access to the people I aim to help. I wish that help to go to those who want to help themselves but lack the funds.
lenders.occupational_info: Detailed analysis of retail figures based on buying experience in retail with companies usch as Lidl and Wal-Mart.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to try and help in what small way I can to make a difference in others lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in travel for a retail company

lenders.name: Jyri
lenders.loan_because: Party donations!
lenders.occupational_info: IT

lenders.name: Viviane
lenders.whereabouts: Rio  de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lenders.name: Norbert
lenders.loan_because: It just makes sense to me, and it moves my heart at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer of medical articles for specialized doctors' journals.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: The world is unfair. I have all the things I need.

lenders.name: Marcos
lenders.loan_because: I would like to use what God gave me to help other lives.

lenders.name: Cornelia
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone fulfill thier dream. I have had help in my life and it is a great way to 'Pay it Forward'.

lenders.name: Suwattana and Ross
lenders.loan_because: Kiva helps average folks help average folks.
lenders.occupational_info: Suwattana works p/t at a local supermarket, Ross works in construction management and supervision for utiliies.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people who help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Builder. Entrepreneur

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It's better than a donation and it goes straight to someone who will use it to improve their lot in life.

lenders.name: Chris & Faith
lenders.loan_because: We loan because global poverty is an important issue to us, and because microloans are working.
